originalText.text: I always get my hair done here, but this time I bought 2 bundles of hair to get a sew-in install, my first time getting extensions and Iâ€™m so glad I chose this place to get it done for my prom and graduation, the hair is amazing quality, I still have my hair in after a month and a half and still in perfect condition, even after getting on pools and the beach, they were very attentive and very good customer service! I love my hair so much.

originalText.text: Literally the worst place EVER to get hair extensions. The Communication skills are horrendous. No one answers. No one tells the price. It's completely unprofessional , & I'm just disgusted. Because this was my favorite place to get extensions.

originalText.text: I got my hair done on June 26 and on July 5th I had to remove the extensions due to the welts on my scalp. Horrible experience. I went there for micro-links, but the donâ€™t do that there they do weft with micro links, which they didnâ€™t explain to me, so I opted for Brazilian Knots. The technician told me this was a great technique, I am not an expert so I believed her.  While she was placing the extensions I notice she was using a black string but I have brown hair, I called her on it she told me they donâ€™t make brown string.  She lied. I had to come back because the knots were big they were hurting. She changed the string to brown half my head, but this time it was worse the knots were so tight they caused welts on my scalp. I had them removed at Le Sorriel the welts were so bad she said my hair would have fallen out.  Horrible this mistake cost me $300 for the installation, $100 to color the 2 packs of hair, $323 to purchase the hair in total $723, totally lost.  Because she cut the hair and didnâ€™t explain it could not be re-stitched I lost the hair as well.  I will say their curly hair is good quality sorry I canâ€™t reuse again. Stay away for any type of hair installation. ðŸ˜«ðŸ˜¡

originalText.text: My gf recently got her hair done here and she loved it, they did exactly what she had asked for and the service was awesome! They were really nice to her, gave her snacks, beverages and itâ€™s very clean!

text.text: My gf recently got her hair done here and she loved it, they did exactly what she had asked for and the service was awesome! They were really nice to her, gave her snacks, beverages and itâ€™s very clean!

originalText.text:
AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COSTS!!! I had an upcoming trip to Bolivia and placed my order well in advance. The company had stated the product would arrive before I left and I figured I'd have plenty of time to have it put in before my trip. Long story short, it didn't arrive before my trip! I was on vacation for nearly two weeks, come back to find the product had arrived and it wasn't what I ordered to begin with! After contacting the company several times, they advised me that I would need to pay to ship the product back and they would not reimburse me. After arguing with some lady (who was one of the most ignorant people I've ever dealt with) she refused to help me any further and would do nothing to make it right. She even literally told me "we are always right!". What kind of company does that?! After advising her I would be forced to dispute the charge with my bank, she said she would send out a post on her Facebook STATING THAT I STOLE HER PRODUCT (give me a break, HOW DARE SHE?). I argued with her for another 30 seconds, advising her that, I have been giving them a chance to make it right, when she outright yelled and hung up on me. This company is a scam, their product isn't what it should be and they even tried to tell me that all of their products are the same. That is impossible! Do not let these people have your money and if they have scammed and threatened you too, let the world know! If only one person takes this warning and doesn't buy from them, it was worth my time.
1. My package did not arrive on time (they always claim to be busy)
2. They sent the wrong item
3. Refused to pay for my return label so I can return the package they messed up.
4. Treated me like garbage.
Enough reasons to give them a bad review.
